children.text: The gutter has come away from the clips that secures it.
Part 3.5.3.4 Installation of gutters of the NCC’s Building Code of Australia (BCA) states that
‘Eaves gutters must be supported by brackets securely fixed at stop ends and at not more than 1.2m centres’
. Additionally, the Victorian Building Authority’s, Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 7.05 Fixing of gutters and downpipes states that
‘Gutters and downpipes are defective if they are not securely fixed’ .
The clips must be installed to properly secure the gutters.
